name: Blacklight
startIntroPart1: Welcome, you where chosen to be the CEO of this secret company, you where sent back in time with the power of immortality, make the right decision to conquest this reality. Over.
startIntroPart2: Sir, we contact you from the future, you are the chosen one to be sent in the past, prove yourself succeeding in this challenge
attacked: The outcome of this battle was choosen long before you where even born, so now surrender yourself or die trying to save your people.
defeated: So at the end i failed my mission, i am not the choosen one
introduction: Greetings, My name is Atlas, the leader of the Blacklight
tradeRequest: I am here to offer you a trade that you could not deny
neutralHello: A fine day, it helps you.
